targets.expr: avg(arubacx_up{job=~"arubacx_.*", application=~"$application", site=~"$site", group=~"$group"}) by (host, group, site, application, segment, environment,instance)

time() 
- sum  by (host, group, site, application, segment, environment, instance) (arubacx_system_boot_time {site=~"$site", group=~"$group"})
sum  by (host, group, site, application, segment, environment, instance) (arubacx_system_boot_time{site=~"$site", group=~"$group"}*1000)
